name: Ley Line Disorder: Belligerence Unfettered
description: When the battle starts, all of your characters will have Belligerence Unfettered attached. When characters would be defeated, they will not be defeated, and heal them to 1 HP. 2 Usages.
descriptionraw: When the battle starts, all of your characters will have <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C402004]</color> attached. When characters would be defeated, they $[K54|s1], and heal them to 1 HP. 2 Usages.
